results.title: Sean Connery, Who Embodied James Bond and More, Dies at 90
results.abstract: To legions of fans who have watched a parade of actors play Agent 007, none played the part as magnetically or as indelibly as Mr. Connery.

results.abstract: What’s more fundamental to scary movies than the bone-chilling shriek? But delivering a terrifying wail isn’t easy. It’s an entire art with a history and a world of its own.

TV’s Horror Hosts: 70 Years of Screams and Cheese
des_facet: The Big Bad B-Movie Show (TV Program)
results.abstract: This Halloween, a new generation of hosts are keeping alive one of television’s oldest gimmicks: costumed goofballs presenting schlocky horror movies.

David Guillod, Hollywood Executive, Arrested Again After Assault Report
results.abstract: Mr. Guillod was out on bail after he was charged earlier this year with sexually assaulting four women.

How New York’s Small Cinemas Are Hanging On
results.abstract: Despite the continued shutdown of the city’s movie houses, indie theaters just may survive: They are less reliant on Hollywood and have a loyal audience.

multimedia.caption: Nick Nicolaou, who owns Cinema Village, and the people behind indie cinemas like Film Forum, Anthology Film Archives and Nitehawk remain in an uneasy limbo, desperate for audiences yet terrified of cinemas becoming petri dishes.
multimedia.copyright: Calla Kessler for The New York Times

results.title: Phillipa Soo’s Week: Fund-Raising Videos and ‘Agents of Chaos’
results.abstract: As Broadway remains on pause, the former “Hamilton” star voices a mythical goddess in Netflix’s “Over the Moon” and is lending her support to causes she believes in.

multimedia.caption: “If I can lend a voice and a platform to issues that I believe in, I’m happy to do it,” said the actress Phillipa Soo.

results.title: The ‘Purge’ Films Reveal the Ugly Truth About America
results.abstract: B movies often tell more honest stories about our society than finely calibrated award-season films do.

results.title: Making the Songs Pop in ‘Bad Hair’
